mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ANIME ( TITLE, THUMNAIL_GARO_URL, THUMNAIL_SERO_URL, WEEKDAY, SCORE, TAGS ) VALUES ( #{TITLE}, #{THUMNAIL_GARO_URL}, #{THUMNAIL_SERO_URL}, #{WEEKDAY}, #{SCORE}, #{TAGS} )
mapper.select: SELECT ANIME_ID, TITLE FROM TBL_ANIME ORDER BY TITLE
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_ANIME SET TITLE = #{TITLE}, THUMBNAIL_GARO_URL = #{THUMBNAILGAROURL}, THUMBNAIL_SERO_URL = #{THUMBNAILSEROURL}, WEEKDAY = #{WEEKDAY}, SCORE = #{SCORE}, TAGS = #{TAGS} WHERE ANIME_ID = #{ANIMEID}
